attributes.action: stop allocating UK funds to other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year our taxes are given out in the form of aid and for other reasons. 

Most recently £50 Million to Pakistan to secure "it's" borders. Money is also given to China, India and others. 

This petition is simply to acknowledge that some UK Tax payers would prefer that our money be spent within the UK. 

Money that could be used in job creation through projects, education, policing, health and the general declining infrastructure of our country. 

Thank you for your time.
